str2: A part of, from, out of
Judah -- 'praised', a son of Jacob, also the southern kingdom, also four Israelites
Benjamin -- 'son of the right hand', youngest son of Jacob, also the name of two other Israelites
Ephraim -- a son of Joseph, also his descendants and their territory

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Manasseh -- 'causing to forget', a son of Joseph, also a king of Judah, also two Israelites

parse: Verb - Qal - Perfect - third person common plural
str2: To sit down, to dwell, to remain, to settle, to marry

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Jerusalem -- probably 'foundation of peace', capital city of all Israel
